entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:18 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 07:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. A few wet flurries over higher terrain this morning. Snow level 600 metres rising to 1000 metres this afternoon. Fog dissipating this morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain overnight. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain early in the morning. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
